Package Project

Class OrderList

java.lang.Object
Project.OrderList
Direct Known Subclasses:
SalesRecord
public class OrderList extends Object
Represents a list of order made by customer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    OrderList()
    Creates an empty list of order.

      public void createOrder​(Menu mainmenu, Staff staff, MemberList memberList, ReservationList resList, int resid)
      Add order into order list.
      Parameters:
      mainmenu - Menu of the restaurant.
      staff - Staff that make the order.
      memberList - List of registered member.
      resList - List of reservation made.
      resid - Reservation ID.

    • checkDuplicate

      public boolean checkDuplicate​(int resid)
      Check for order duplication. Prevents the creation of duplicate orders with the same resid (same table).
      Parameters:
      resid - Reservation ID which represent one table.
      Returns:
      A boolean to determine if order is duplicated.
